alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 5:53PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Arapahoe and south central Adams Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 553 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Manila Village, or 22 miles east of Denver, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Aurora, Bennett, Watkins, Strasburg, Byers and Manila Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County
